title: Experience the magic of The Greek Islands at Leros Municipal Airport (LGLE)
description:
In this short we will look at the updated Leros Municipal Airport (ICAO: LGLE) which has been released  in the marketplace for MSFS 2020 this week. 

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
